features: SOFT CAR TOYS SET WITH PLAY MAT: This pull back cars toy set features a collection of soft vehicles that provide a delightful tactile experience. The accompanying play mat adds an interactive element to playtime, allowing children to explore different road scenarios and engage in imaginative play. The soft material ensures a gentle touch, making it safe and comfortable for delicate hands.

EASY TO CLEAN AND STORAGE: We understand the importance of convenience when it comes to parenting responsibilities, which is why this car toy set is designed for easy cleaning and storage. The pull back toys can be easily wiped clean using a damp cloth or mild soap, ensuring hygiene is maintained at all times. Additionally, the compact size allows for effortless storage in small spaces or travel bags.

SAFE DESIGN FOR BABY: With utmost consideration for your little one's safety, this baby soft toys set boasts a design that meets stringent safety standards. Furthermore, the rounded edges and smooth surfaces eliminate any potential risks of injury or harm.

PROMOTES MULTIPLE SKILL DEVELOPMENT: Beyond providing entertainment value, this pull back car vehicle set offers numerous benefits in terms of skill development. As children explore with these toys through pull-back actions or rolling them on the ground, they enhance their fine motor skills while also developing hand-eye coordination and spatial awareness.

GIFT FOR 12 MONTHS AND UP: Searching for an ideal gift has just become easier with this pull back toy cars set! Suitable for babies aged 12 months and up, it caters to their developmental needs during crucial stages of growth. Introducing them to colors, shapes, and cause-and-effect relationships creates a nurturing environment that aids in cognitive development while offering hours of engaging entertainment.
body.description: Hiitytin Baby Truck Car Toy with Playmat The perfect toy for your little one's imaginative playtime! With its pull-back feature, this toy allows your baby to easily move the car forward by simply pulling it back and releasing it. This helps develop their fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. The included play mat is designed with a colorful road map, complete with traffic signs and landmarks, creating a realistic and immersive play environment. Your baby can drive their plush car around the mat, exploring different routes and creating their own adventures. Pull-back feature for easy movement Play mat with colorful road map and traffic signs Soft and plush car toy made from high-quality materials Promotes fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Motor Skills
reviews.reviewText: These pull back cars remind me of the small metal cars that would keep my boys busy years ago. When I saw these soft pull back cars for toddlers, I thought they would be perfect for my grandchild. Grandma wants to play too. These cars are soft with rubber wheels and are a perfect fit for small hands. The mat for the cars has handles and velcro sides and can be converted from a mat to a carrying bag for the cars for storage or traveling. It is considered an educational toy, as it helps with motor control, and is a visual tool as the cars zoom on the mat. This is a toy for 12 months +. Of course, a 12 month old may need some help.
